Table 3.

CAR from this verification

CAR ID 01 Section no. 4.4 Date: 29/10/2023 Description of CAR

Verification team has found that to clarify how the emission reduc meter calibration was delayed during this monitoring period. PP need ion has been calculated on conservative basis for the delayed period.

Project participant response

Date: 12/02/2024

Based on the already provided calibration certificate, indeed the error identified in the delayed calibration test is beyond the maximum permissible error of the measuring equipment. Thus, paragraph 366 (b) of CDM validation and verification standard for project activities version 03.0 is applied. Therefore, the applicable error of 0.204% was conservatively deducted for the period going from 01/07/2022 to 31/12/2022 (% of error available in the Annexe 1.2 - page 2 from the calibration details file of G1- of the year 2021). It is the only error higher than the permissible error of 0.2%.
